result.execSummary:
The defendant Kristina M. Weigelt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Interfere w/ Child Custody-Other Parent, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.31(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: AODA Assessment. Must comply with treatment and after care. Not to consume any alcohol. Not to enter an establishment that serves alcohol for consumption on premises except for employment purposes. Not to consume/possess any controlled substances unless prescribed by a licensed doctor.  Any and all other conditions the DOC imposes. Must follow family court visitation order.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kristina M. Weigelt in court with attorney Kat Mcclain.  Defendant Kristina M. Weigelt in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and appearances. No additions or corrections to the PSI.    State speaks re: case and sentencing and recommends 4 years probation.  Atty Mcclain speaks to the court re: sentencing, asking for probation.  Ms. Paula Morton makes statement to the court.  Defendant speaks to the court.  
Court sentences the defendant to 4 years probation.     Conditions:  60 Days County Jail, Credit 52 days. Assessment, Comply with treatment and after care. Must not consume any alcohol. Not to enter an establishment that sells alcohol for consumption on premises except for employment purposes.  Not to possess or consume any controlled substances unless prescribed by a licensed doctor.  Any and all other conditions that the DOC imposes.  Must follow family court visitation order.  + costs.

Defendant Kristina M. Weigelt in court with attorney Kat Mcclain.  Defendant Kristina M. Weigelt in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Thomas Bitney present in court.   David Undahl present in court.  Deft's mother present in court.
3:04 pm Court recites case & app; Motion to vacate DGPA; DA - calls David Undahl - sworn & testifies, Ex. 1 Order from family file, identified, further testimony, State offers Ex 1 - no obj - Ex 1 rec'd; Atty M - cross; DA - nothing; Court - ?'s; Atty M - recross; DA - redirect; witness excused; DA - nothing further, state rests; Atty M - calls Kristina Weigelt - sworn & testifies; DA - statements; Atty M - redirect; DA - Ex. 2 DGPA, identified, further testimony, identifies Ex. 1, offers Ex 2, no obj, rec'd Ex 2, cont'd testimony; Atty M - nothing further, witness excused; DA - argument; Atty M - argument; DA - further argument; COURT: finds deft breached DGPA, takes jud notice of family file, DGPA vacated, enter JOC convicting deft of felony, order PSI - agent not appear. Off record for scheduling 3:39 p.m.   3:40 pm Back on record:  9/28 at 3:00 p.m. for sentencing.  Bail revoked.  Adj'd 3:41 p.m.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 28, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Motion hearing on August 25, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant, Kristina M. Weigelt appeared in custody with Attorney Kat Mcclain.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State. Set next motion hearing for 8-25-2016 from 3:00 pm- 4:30 pm. Ms Weigelt brought over from jail to go over bail. 2:35pm on record. Court calls case and appearances. Atty McClain makes statement. DA Frost makes statement, requests around $2500 if bail is imposed. Atty McClain makes statements, requests $1,000. Court denies $1,000 bail request. Court recites case history. Court denies all bail requests. Ms Weigelt will stay in custody until next weeks motion hearing.  ajd'd 2:40 pm

to Vacate DJOC

Defendant, Kristina M. Weigelt appeared with Attorney James C. McLaughlin.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State.  Court calls case and appearances.  Atty McL offers a plea questionaire and waiver of rights form.  Court questions Ms. Weigelt regarding her plea questionaire and waiver of rights.  Court finds that Ms. Weigelt freely and knowingly waives her rights.  Court finds there is a factual basis.  Court speaks to the def. 

Count 1-Def. pleas no contest, court accepts plea and finds that the DJOC is acceptable.

Motion hearing on April 6, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Attorney James C. McLaughlin in court for Defendant Kristina M. Weigelt. Prosecuting Atty Thomas H Frost appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Kristina M. Weigelt in court. Defendant, Kristina M. Weigelt appeared.  DA Frost calls Captain Pank to the stand, sworn in by clerk.  Frost questions witness, testifies.  Objection by McLaughlin. Atty Frost restates question, resumes testifying.  Court finds Officer has identified defendant.  Atty McLaughlin questions witness, testifies.  No cross, redirects. Witness is excused, steps down. No testimony for other witnesses.  Attorney Frost argues.  Atty McLaughlin argues.  Copy of court order attached to complaint.  Court finds probable cause. Parties acknowledge Information received, waives formal reading. Court allows until 1/30 for judicial substitution. Motions due 2/27. Motion Hearing/Status - 4/6 at 11:00. Bail to continue.  Motion hearing scheduled for April 6, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on December 29, 2014 at 04:00 pm.
